articles.content: Marking the culmination of Pride Month celebrations in New York City, this weekend will be a busy one, full of events all around New York City. Whether you celebrate among family and friends or plan … [+5393 chars]

articles.title: Anderson's couture craftmanship captivates at Loewe for Paris men's fashion week - The Associated Press
articles.description: PARIS (AP) — A sparkling mist of water from towering fountains cooled overheated VIP guests at Spanish luxury fashion house Loewe’s show on Saturday at Paris Fashion Week. Its Northern Irish designer Jonathan Anderson masterfully translated the essence of scu…
